name: api-practice-project
description: API testing practice project with Express, cookies, JWT, and CRUD for Postman learners.

scripts.test:newman: newman run "API_postman_collection.json" -e QA.postman_environment.json -r cli,htmlextra,junitfull,json --reporter-htmlextra-export reports/report.html --reporter-junitfull-export reports/report.xml --reporter-json-export reports/report.json
